<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:4a5634841b71e51080feea02f54bcbb7=Learning Center^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Room Reservation">fdc27c801b71e51080feea02f54bcb3f</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
// Learning Centre Attendee Information
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_in_person_attendees',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('will_there_be_any_remote_attendees',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_remote_attendee',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('will_there_be_any_non_niaid_attendees',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_non_niaid_attendees_ai',false);


g_form.setDisplay('attendee_information',false);	
	// Learning Centre Attendee Information
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	//Learning Centre Attendee Information
g_form.setDisplay('attendee_information',true);	
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_in_person_attendees',true);
	g_form.setMandatory('will_there_be_any_remote_attendees',true);
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_remote_attendee',false);
	g_form.setVisible('number_of_remote_attendee',false);
	g_form.setMandatory('will_there_be_any_non_niaid_attendees',true);
	g_form.setMandatory('number_of_non_niaid_attendees_ai',false);
	g_form.setVisible('number_of_non_niaid_attendees_ai',false);

}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Learning Centre Attendee Information</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bassem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-24 17:36:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a343f1111bb1e910fdd8848ce54bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Learning Centre Attendee Information</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OWS Meet" source="x_g_nioa_ows_meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OWS Meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_a343f1111bb1e910fdd8848ce54bcbda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bassem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-21 20:27:46</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
